name: PCKG_UBC_SPECIFIC
body_snippet:
package PCKG_UBC_SPECIFIC is

  -- Author  : ADMINISTRATOR
  -- Created : 11/5/2003 8:01:55 AM
  -- Purpose : All UBC Realted Procedures and Functions are stored in this Package
  
  -- Public type declarations
--  type <TypeName> is <Datatype>;
  
  -- Public constant declarations
--  <ConstantName> constant <Datatype> := <Value>;

  -- Public variable declarations
--  <VariableName> <Datatype>;
  gnum_auto_gnrt_dmnd_book_id          NUMBER(5);
  -- Public function and procedure declarations
  PROCEDURE POPULATE_TEMP_TABLE_FOR_DEMAND(parm_job_card_no          NUMBER,
                                           parm_demand_date          DATE,
                                           parm_entered_by           NUMBER,
                                           parm_job_card_ref_no      VARCHAR2,
                                           parm_item_2b_prod_desc    VARCHAR2,
                                           parm_item_2b_prod_qty     NUMBER,
                                           parm_demand_item_id       NUMBER,
                                           parm_demand_srno          NUMBER,
                                           parm_demand_qty           NUMBER,
                                           parm_uom_id               NUMBER,
                                           parm_job_type             VARCHAR2);
                                           
  PROCEDURE CREATE_DEMAND_DOCUMENT(parm_demand_id OUT NUMBER, parm_old_dmnd_no IN NUMBER);

  PROCEDURE SE
